dataIdInfo.idAbs: Tool used to determine if segments/branches are part of a braided section of the Stream network. This is useful for data validation and repair of the Stream Network.

tool.name: FindBraidedNetworkTool

param.name: InputStreamNetwork
param.dialogReference:
Stream network to check for braids.

* This tool modifies input dataset:

* Adds (or overwrites) `IsBraidedReach` Field:

* Value = 1: Segment is part of a braided section of the network

* value = 0: Segment is not part of a braided section of the network.

tool.summary: Tool used to determine if segments/branches are part of a braided section of the Stream network. This is useful for data validation and repair of the Stream Network.
